mapper.select: WITH my_rooms AS ( SELECT cr.chat_room_id AS room_id, CASE WHEN cr.user1_id = #{me} THEN cr.user2_id ELSE cr.user1_id END AS peer_user_id FROM chat_room cr WHERE cr.user1_id = #{me} OR cr.user2_id = #{me} ), last_msg AS ( SELECT m.chat_room_id AS room_id, m.message_id AS last_message_id, m.message AS last_text, m.chat_message_created_at AS last_created_at, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.chat_room_id ORDER BY m.message_id DESC) AS rn FROM chat_message m JOIN my_rooms r ON r.room_id = m.chat_room_id ), last_msg_1 AS ( SELECT room_id, last_message_id, last_text, last_created_at FROM last_msg WHERE rn = 1 ), unread AS ( SELECT m.chat_room_id AS room_id, COUNT(*) AS unread_count FROM chat_message m JOIN chat_participant p ON p.chat_room_id = m.chat_room_id AND p.user_id = #{me} WHERE m.message_id > COALESCE(p.last_read_message_id, 0) AND m.sender_id != #{me} GROUP BY m.chat_room_id ) SELECT r.room_id, u.user_id AS peer_user_id, u.nickname AS peer_nickname, u.profile_image AS peer_avatar, false AS peer_verified, CASE WHEN b.badge_level IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CONCAT('LV. ', b.badge_level, ' ', b.badge_name) END AS peer_level_text, b.badge_image_url AS peer_badge_image_url, lm.last_message_id, lm.last_text, lm.last_created_at, COALESCE(ud.unread_count, 0) AS unread_count, COALESCE(lm.last_created_at, NOW()) AS updated_at FROM my_rooms r LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = r.peer_user_id LEFT JOIN user_score us ON us.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN badge b ON b.badge_id = us.badge_id LEFT JOIN last_msg_1 lm ON lm.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN unread ud ON ud.room_id = r.room_id ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
